categoryDescriptions.math: Solve complex mathematical problems easily, from algebra to calculus.
categoryDescriptions.finance: Tools for financial planning, loan calculations, taxes, and investments.
categoryDescriptions.health: Track your health through BMI calculators, calories, and nutritional needs.
categoryDescriptions.converter: Convert between various standard units quickly and accurately.
categoryDescriptions.physics: Accurate physics calculations for mechanics, electricity, and energy.
categoryDescriptions.engineering: Specialized tools for engineers and designers.
categoryDescriptions.education: Educational tools to help students in their studies.
categoryDescriptions.date-time: Calculate time differences and convert between different calendars.
categoryDescriptions.misc: A variety of useful tools for different daily needs.
categoryDescriptions.geometry: Calculate areas, volumes, and various geometric shapes.
categoryDescriptions.business: Tools for business management, profit calculation, and productivity.
categoryDescriptions.construction: Calculators for construction projects, material estimation, and costs.
categoryDescriptions.automotive: Everything you need for your car from fuel consumption to trip costs.
categoryDescriptions.cooking: Convert cooking ingredients and adjust recipe quantities.
categoryDescriptions.gaming: Tools and calculators dedicated to gaming and entertainment.
categoryDescriptions.agriculture: Farm calculations, irrigation, and crop planning.
categoryDescriptions.science: Advanced scientific tools for various research fields.
categoryDescriptions.electrical: Calculations for electrical circuits, power, and voltage.
categoryDescriptions.astronomy: Explore space with distance and celestial body calculators.
categoryDescriptions.statistics: Tools for data analysis and mathematical statistics.
categoryDescriptions.real-estate: Mortgage calculations, ROI, and property values.
categoryDescriptions.fitness: Tools to improve your physical fitness and track your workouts.
categoryDescriptions.environmental: Calculate your environmental footprint and contribute to sustainability.
categoryDescriptions.pet: Everything you need to care for your pets.
